isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB: 5000, 9100, 9200, 9300, 9400 - OPERATION - WINDSHIELD WASHERS WITH WING PANEL MOUNTED CONTROLS

svcproc.title: WINDSHIELD WASHERS WITH WING PANEL MOUNTED CONTROLS
svcproc.para: The control for the windshield washers is a combination intermittent wiper operation/washer control sliding (rheostat) switch.
Operate the washers on both wiper arms simultaneously by sliding the slide lever to the washer position. The washers and wipers operate, then shut off automatically.
